name: Fallen Star (ZoR Dev)
description:
When the night literally falls, how can you survive?

Well, you chose to shoot parts of the moon to destroy the falling stars. Will it be enough? There's no doubt that you will fall one day...

The game is easy : you just have to click on the screen wherever you want to shoot, and the moon will go straight in that direction.

Entry for the 1h game jam which took place 26th October 2019.
